-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Episode Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Animated comedy clip show in which Slabovia.tv's teenage geniuses Kierky and
Nietzsche look at the life and works of the ten greatest philosophers. Kierky
and Nietzsche tackle "I Think Therefore I Am Man" Descartes in today's show. A
clip of an old man leaping from a high diving board dressed in a rubber suit is
used to convey Descarte's big idea.

                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The fourth episode out of ten of a educational show on Channel 4 (UK). Although
this is just out of the 24:00 to 34:59 range for 233MB releases, I have made it
233MB because this gets the best quality compared to 175MB. The episode number
is from the Channel 4 learning website, so is official. Enjoy!
